page.title: 05HEDNESFORD-SPORT AND LEISURE
page.content: Numerous sporting facilities are available in Hednesford. There is a park, supplying a play area for under fourteens and facilities for football, cricket, bowls, putting and tennis, the site covering some 5 acres. Hednesford has a private golf course, Beaudesert, available to paying members. It also has an amateur cricket club playing in a recognised league. Hednesford has a thriving football club, Hednesford Town, which is 104 years old and is presently playing in the Southern Midland League. Hednesford Raceway also plays a dominant role in the leisure facilities available. Belonging to Â£Incarace' and catering for stock rods, super rods, ramp jump races and speed racing, the National Championships are to be held at the raceway during September 1985.
